Class VerifiedPhoneViewModel

java.lang.Object
io.jans.casa.ui.vm.user.UserViewModel
io.jans.casa.ui.vm.user.VerifiedPhoneViewModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
TwilioVerifiedPhoneViewModel
public class VerifiedPhoneViewModel extends UserViewModel
This is the ViewModel of page phone-detail-shared.zul. It controls the CRUD of verified phones
